description: Lists the Slack workspace configurations for an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The point where pagination should resume when the response returns only partial results.

nested_items.name: slackWorkspaceConfigurations
nested_items.description: The configurations for a Slack workspace.

nested_items.name: allowOrganizationMemberAccount
nested_items.description: Whether to allow member accounts to authorize Slack workspaces. Member accounts must be part of an organization in Organizations.

nested_items.name: teamId
nested_items.description: The team ID in Slack. This ID uniquely identifies a Slack workspace, such as T012ABCDEFG.

nested_items.name: teamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Slack workspace.
